original_title: La maldición, el milagro y el burro
overview: Tells the story of Gramlote, a small community in the region of Norte de Santander (Colombia) which through its inhabitants, political and religious personalities testify on the past, present and future of a community that saw its houses tumble one by one, slowly, at nature’s pace.
title: La maldición, el milagro y el burro
